A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved The Last Jedi! *thumbs up to Rian*!\nBefore TLJ I was a casual fan of the SW franchise\, after TLJ my presence in the cinema for IX is an absolute given. Perhaps my opinion as a previously casual fan is not as valid or justified as older more invested fans\, but from where I was sitting\, characters failure\, arch's and motivations ROCKED. Perhaps FRESH\, nuanced and complex characters are just not some peoples cuppa? ... Can't wait for more! ;)
